name: Gem Blenders TCGO
description:
Gem Blenders is a real life trading card game based in Brooklyn NYC with an ever so evolving community.

After talking to the lead designer Steve Sukula, I decided to make an online version, because I believe the whole world has to enjoy this wonderful card game. The normal experience is enhanced with added animations and SFX.

I have high hopes and dreams for this project, after a whole year I still believe this could be a big hit. Every penny I earn will go straight into better quality gameplay.

You cannot download the game yet, there are yet too many things that need to be fixed. Right now, I am able to queue two builds against each other, both with a starter deck, and play them against each other. 

It a real prototype, but expect a lot more from me!

If you already love what you see, then I highly suggest giving their site a visit: https://www.gemblenders.com/home/
